text: Box Car Racer was an American Alternative rock/Post-hardcore band from San Diego, California that were active from 2001 to 2003. Box Car Racer was a side-project for Blink-182 members Tom DeLonge and Travis Barker and lead guitarist of Hazen Street, David Kennedy and touring bassist Anthony Celestino. When they were active they were signed to the record label MCA Records. ==Discography== ===Albums=== *Box Car Racer (2002) ===Singles=== *"I Feel So" (2009) *"There Is" (2003) ==Websites== *Box Car Racer at Interscope records Category:2001 establishments in California Category:2000s disestablishments in California Category:2003 disestablishments in the United States Category:Musical groups from San Diego Category:Post-hardcore bands Category:American punk bands Category:Pop punk bands Category:American rock bands Category:2000s American music groups
title: Box Car Racer
